casebody.data:
The NC State Bar
v.
Tillett 208PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2016 David P. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Kevin A. Rust, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Tillett, Jerry R. G. Patrick Murphy, Attorney at Law, Jennifer A. Porter, Deputy Counsel, Katherine Jean, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, *792David R. Johnson, Deputy Counsel, for The NC State Bar Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Judicial Standards Commission

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of August 2016 by Plaintiff to Amend

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of August 2016."
